title: S3 Ep56: The secret war in Laos
itunes:title: The secret war in Laos
description: Laotians are still suffering collateral damage from a covert war that the US waged in the country half a century ago. Felipe Valencia Caicedo tells Tim Phillips about the devastating impact of the bombing of Laos, and how we can help victims of conflict in future.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
